meanings.sent1: The rejectees felt sad after not being chosen for the team.
meanings.sent2: The school counselor provided support for the rejectees.
meanings.sent3: The rejectees decided to start their own club for fun.
meanings.sent4: The rejectees were like forgotten toys in a dusty attic.
meanings.sent5: The rejectees' faces showed disappointment and hurt.

meanings.definition: The act of rejecting someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The rejectees of the job applications were informed via email.
meanings.sent2: The rejectees of the art pieces were carefully selected by the curator.
meanings.sent3: The rejectees of the cookies were left on the plate for the ants to find.
meanings.sent4: The rejectees of the invitations were left wondering why they weren't invited.
meanings.sent5: The rejectees of the ideas were quickly dismissed by the team.
